Text:
Belated mega-thanx LeonardTSpock for the treasure trove of comics & related uploads!

Please seed!

Hi LeonardTSpock, really enjoying these comics journal uploads. However, I am writing an academic thesis on Grant Morrison. I was wondering if you could spare the time to upload Comics Journal #176, if you have time? Any help would be much appreciated. I am a big fan of your scans, and any help would be much appreciated. THANKS!!

ajsztehlo, you're most welcome. Unfortunately, I've uploaded every TCJ that I have in possession or have access to at the moment. I could eventually have around another 50 issues, but it's taking a very long time, and I may just give up.
@LeonardTSpock: Thanks for uploading these comics. Haha and thanks for the help, don't worry about it. I've been downloading your comics offerings for a while and you provide some great scans!
